roleset.name: Old school, Traditional

role.descr: thought or idea that is old

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: The clothes my uncle and aunt wear really are a little too old-fashioned now.
example.arg: The clothes my uncle and aunt wear

example.name: both args
example.text: John is old-fashioned in his attitude towards sex

roleset.note: Based on Bold data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie and Meredith.
